statements: UPDATE incidents SET status='resolved' WHERE incident_id=123;
UPDATE incidents SET date='2022-08-15', reported_by='Alice' WHERE incident_id=456;
UPDATE incidents SET status = 'resolved', description = 'Incident resolved successfully' WHERE incident_id = 1001
UPDATE incidents SET date = '2022-09-30', location = 'Office Building', reported_by = 'John Doe' WHERE incident_id = 2002
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE investigation SET findings = 'Completed investigation' WHERE investigation_id = 1;
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Theft incident', employee_involved = 'John Doe' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE investigation SET findings = 'Inconclusive', corrective_actions = 'Further investigation needed' WHERE investigator = 'Alice Smith' AND incident_id = 3;
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Vandalism incident reported' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE witnesses SET statement = 'I witnessed the whole incident' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Vandalism reported by neighbors' WHERE incident_id = 123
UPDATE witnesses SET contact_info = '555-1234' WHERE witness_id = 456
UPDATE incidents SET description = 'Updated description', reported_by = 'John Doe' WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE corrective_actions SET responsible_person = 'Jane Smith', completion_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE action_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE incidents SET classification = 'High' WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE corrective_actions SET action_description = 'Implement new safety measures', responsible_person = 'John Doe' WHERE incident_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE IncidentReports SET location = 'New Location', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE incident_id = 12345;
UPDATE InvestigatorNotes SET note = 'Investigation is complete', timestamp = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE note_id = 54321;

UPDATE InvestigatorNotes SET note = 'New note added', timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE note_id = 3;
